       if (result.success && result.data) {
         const serverConfig = {
           BASE_URL: result.data['comfyui.server_url'] || this.defaultConfig.BASE_URL,
           CLIENT_ID: result.data['comfyui.client_id'] || this.defaultConfig.CLIENT_ID,
-          REQUEST_TIMEOUT: parseInt(result.data['comfyui.request_timeout']) || this.defaultConfig.REQUEST_TIMEOUT,
+          REQUEST_TIMEOUT: parseInt(result.data['comfyui.timeout']) || parseInt(result.data['comfyui.request_timeout']) || this.defaultConfig.REQUEST_TIMEOUT,
           HEALTH_CHECK_TIMEOUT: parseInt(result.data['comfyui.health_check_timeout']) || this.defaultConfig.HEALTH_CHECK_TIMEOUT,
           AUTO_SWITCH: result.data['comfyui.auto_switch'] === 'true' || result.data['comfyui.auto_switch'] === true,
           MAX_RETRIES: parseInt(result.data['comfyui.max_retries']) || this.defaultConfig.MAX_RETRIES,
           BACKUP_SERVERS: this.parseBackupServers(result.data['comfyui.backup_servers'])
